content.raw:
It seems right now the current concept of a "system type" is determined during runtime, and is even able to change for any given `System` instance during runtime.

Plugin registration happens at compile time, so right now there’s a conceptual issue with trying to identify the “system type” of a plugin before loading it.

I've started implementing the ability to give plugins "aliases" \(or we could call them "labels" instead if anyone would prefer\), which could accomplish what you're looking for here. But I do have some higher level concerns about the `System` interface that I’ll try to articulate in a comment on the main thread.
